Class UserHomePage

java.lang.Object
application.framework.BasePage
application.pages.UserHomePage
public class UserHomePage extends BasePage
Constructs the UserHomePage and initializes the layout and user interface components. Handles question creation, display, editing, deletion, and filtering. Also manages navigation and user session-based behavior.
Author:
Atharva

  • Constructor Details

    • UserHomePage

      public UserHomePage()
      Constructs the UserHomePage and loads the list of questions from the database.

  • Method Details

    • updateResults

      public static void updateResults(List<Question> list)
      Updates the ListView used for displaying search results.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of questions to display as search results.

    • createView

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane createView()
      Creates and returns the main user interface view (layout) for the user home page. Includes buttons for adding/editing/deleting/filtering questions and viewing answers.
      Specified by:
      createView in class BasePage
      Returns:
      The main content pane for the user page.

    • createQuestionStage

      private void createQuestionStage(int userID)
      Initializes the stage and layout used for creating new questions.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the current user creating the question.

    • loadQuestions

      private void loadQuestions()
      Loads and displays questions in the ListView based on current filters.

    • addQuestion

      private void addQuestion(int userID)
      Adds a new question to the database and refreshes the question list.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user creating the question.

    • deleteQuestion

      private void deleteQuestion()
      Deletes the currently selected question from the database.

    • editQuestionWindow

      private void editQuestionWindow(int questionId)
      Opens a window for editing the selected question's title and content.
      Parameters:
      questionId - The ID of the question to edit.

    • ShowQuestionWindow

      private void ShowQuestionWindow()
      Displays the window for creating a new question.

    • createAnswerStage

      private void createAnswerStage(int questionId)
      Initializes and sets up the UI components for the answerStage, which includes displaying the question, showing a list of answers, and providing controls to add, edit, delete, or mark answers as a solution.
      Parameters:
      questionId - The ID of the question for which answers are to be managed.

    • loadAnswers

      private void loadAnswers(int questionID)
      Loads all answers associated with the given question ID from the database and populates the answerListView. If an answer is marked as a solution, it is displayed with a checkmark and sets the resolution flag.
      Parameters:
      questionID - The ID of the question of whose answers should be loaded.

    • addAnswer

      private void addAnswer()
      Submits a new answer for the currently selected question. The input content is validated and added to the system. The answer list is updated after successful submission.

    • deleteAnswer

      private void deleteAnswer()
      Deletes the selected answer from the database and removes it from the ListView. If the deleted answer was marked as a solution, the resolved status is reset and the questions are reloaded.

    • editAnswerWindow

      private void editAnswerWindow(int answerId)
      Opens a modal window allowing the user to edit the content of an existing answer. Once edited, the answer is updated in the database and the list is refreshed.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The ID of the answer to be edited.

    • showAnswerWindow

      private void showAnswerWindow(int questionID)
      Sets the answerStage title to the question's title, loads all answers related to the question, and displays the stage.
      Parameters:
      questionID - The ID of the question of whose answers should be displayed.
